alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Johnson; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Carter; Southeast Greene; Southeast Monroe; Unicoi (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 12 at 3:13AM CST until March 12 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches with up to 10 inches possible across the highest elevations of the Smoky Mountains. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Far east Tennessee Mountains. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Today. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow and ice covered roadways with slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing and drifting of the snow is expected which will greatly reduce visibilities at times. Besides the snow, wind chills will drop to 5 to 15 degrees below zero across the higher elevations tonight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
